nodes.text: Otor's Hub was a black market space station in the Outer Rim Territories' Ojoster sector. Located close to a planet, it was fairly large and served as a way station within the Outer Rim. During the Clone Wars, Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi and Sith assassin–turned–bounty hunter Asajj Ventress stopped on Otor's Hub together after losing a confrontation with the Sith brothers Darth Maul and Savage Opress over Raydonia.
